page.title: 04Adults employed at school
page.content: {ADULTS WHO WORK AT FELTON SCHOOL. { There are 4 teachers at Felton School. The Nursery teacher is only at school for 3 half days. She travels to 2 other schools, one is 9km south of Felton and the other is 9km west of Felton. 2 teachers live in villages close to Felton to the west and north-west. There are 2 cooks,2 dinner ladies,1 caretaker and 1 secretary. They all live in Felton Village. The gardeners come every week from Alnwick,15km to the north. The building inspector comes every month from Northumberland County Hall in Morpeth,16km to the south. The Vicar comes to school every week. He used to have a long walk from the Vicarage by the Church. Now he lives in the new estate close to the school.
